about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building Christian community in the Capital Region
about.description1: Albany Prayer Group is a vibrant Telugu Christian Fellowship located in Albany, New York. We are a close-knit community of 20-25 Telugu families from Albany, Latham, Niskayuna, East Greenbush and Guilderland areas, dedicated to growing in faith and fellowship together.
about.description2: Our mission is to provide fellowship for Christians, grow in the word of God, lead Bible studies, and reach out to the Indian community in the capital region. We focus especially on equipping our next generation by involving them in worship, Bible verse recitation, and giving them opportunities to share the word in our monthly all-night prayer meetings.

children.title: Children Ministry
children.subtitle: Nurturing the next generation in faith
children.description: Our children's ministry is at the heart of our fellowship. We believe in equipping our next generation with strong Biblical foundations and involving them actively in worship and service.
children.activity3: Monthly opportunities to share God's word
children.rallyDescription: Join us for our special children's rally where kids share testimonies, perform worship songs, and learn more about God's love.

testimonies.title: Testimonies
testimonies.subtitle: Stories of God's faithfulness in our community
testimonies.testimony1: Being part of Albany Prayer Group has strengthened our family's faith journey. The fellowship and support we receive here is truly a blessing from God.
testimonies.testimony2: Our children love participating in the ministry activities. It's wonderful to see them grow in their understanding of God's word through this fellowship.
testimonies.testimony3: The Bible studies and prayer meetings have deepened our relationship with Christ. We're grateful for this Christian community in Albany.
testimonies.author: - APG Family
